title: Repository lacks git version control initialization
recommendation: Initialize git with `git init` and create an initial commit to enable change tracking, branching, and collaboration workflows.

title: AGENTS.md contains a large hard-coded skill registry
recommendation: Move the skill list to a generated manifest (or separate include file) and keep AGENTS.md focused on policy/instructions to reduce manual update burden and drift risk.

title: High density of documentation in root directory
recommendation: Move design and research markdown files from the project root into the 'docs/' directory to improve project organization and declutter the workspace.

title: Hardcoded default language rule may reduce portability

evidence.snippet: - Default output language: Chinese (Simplified)，在规划文档中和所有输出中都尽量使用中文.

recommendation: Move language preference into a configurable setting (for example, environment variable or per-project config) and document an override mechanism to improve reuse across different teams and repositories.

title: Missing documentation for runtime directory

evidence.snippet: runtime/ directory exists but lacks README or documentation

recommendation: Add a README.md to document the purpose and contents of the runtime directory
